sqlMap.statement:
SELECT DISTINCT DISC.GLBL_CMPY_CD AS GLBL_CMPY_CD ,DISC.DS_INV_SLS_CR_PK AS DS_INV_SLS_CR_PK ,DISC.INV_NUM AS INV_NUM ,DISC.SLS_REP_TOC_CD AS SLS_REP_TOC_CD ,DISC.SLS_REP_CR_PCT AS SLS_REP_CR_PCT ,DISC.INV_LINE_SPL_TP_CD AS INV_LINE_SPL_TP_CD ,DISC.INV_LINE_SPL_PCT AS INV_LINE_SPL_PCT ,DISC.MDSE_CD AS MDSE_CD ,DISC.COA_BR_CD AS COA_BR_CD ,DISC.TRX_RSN_CD AS TRX_RSN_CD ,IV.ORIG_INV_NUM AS ORIG_INV_NUM ,IV.CR_REBIL_RSN_CATG_CD AS CR_REBIL_RSN_CATG_CD ,IV.CPO_ORD_NUM AS CPO_ORD_NUM ,IL.SVC_INV_CHRG_TP_CD AS SVC_INV_CHRG_TP_CD ,IL.INV_BOL_LINE_NUM AS INV_BOL_LINE_NUM ,IL.INV_LINE_NUM AS INV_LINE_NUM ,IL.INV_LINE_SUB_NUM AS INV_LINE_SUB_NUM ,IL.INV_LINE_SUB_TRX_NUM AS INV_LINE_SUB_TRX_NUM ,IL.CPO_DTL_LINE_NUM AS CPO_DTL_LINE_NUM ,SIL.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK AS SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK ,SIL.INTG_MDSE_CD AS INTG_MDSE_CD ,AIAD.PROC_DT AS PROC_DT ,AIAD.GL_DT AS GL_DT FROM DS_INV_SLS_CR DISC ,INV IV ,INV_LINE IL ,AJE_INV_ACCT_DIST AIAD ,SVC_INV_LINE SIL WHERE DISC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND DISC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND DISC.INV_NUM = IV.INV_NUM AND DISC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = IV.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND DISC.EZCANCELFLAG = IV.EZCANCELFLAG AND IV.INV_TP_CD = #invTpCdCm#
AND IV.SYS_SRC_CD NOT IN (#nfm#, #ne6#)
AND DISC.INV_NUM = IL.INV_NUM AND DISC.INV_BOL_LINE_NUM = IL.INV_BOL_LINE_NUM AND DISC.INV_LINE_NUM = IL.INV_LINE_NUM AND DISC.INV_LINE_SUB_NUM = IL.INV_LINE_SUB_NUM AND DISC.INV_TRX_LINE_SUB_NUM = IL.INV_LINE_SUB_TRX_NUM AND DISC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = IL.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND DISC.EZCANCELFLAG = IL.EZCANCELFLAG AND DISC.DS_INV_SLS_CR_PK = AIAD.DS_INV_SLS_CR_PK AND DISC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = AIAD.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND DISC.EZCANCELFLAG = AIAD.EZCANCELFLAG AND AIAD.GL_DT = #batProcDt# AND IL.SVC_INV_LINE_PK = SIL.SVC_INV_LINE_PK(+) AND IL.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SIL.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND IL.EZCANCELFLAG = SIL.EZCANCELFLAG(+) ORDER BY DISC.INV_NUM ,DISC.DS_INV_SLS_CR_PK

SELECT DISC.DS_INV_SLS_CR_PK AS DS_INV_SLS_CR_PK ,DISC.DFRD_ACCTG_RULE_CD AS DFRD_ACCTG_RULE_CD ,DAR.DFRD_REV_FLG AS DFRD_REV_FLG FROM INV IV ,INV_LINE IL ,DS_INV_SLS_CR DISC ,DFRD_ACCTG_RULE DAR ,(SELECT CPO.ORD_SRC_REF_NUM ,CD.ORD_SRC_REF_LINE_NUM ,CD.ORD_SRC_REF_LINE_SUB_NUM FROM INV IV2 ,INV_LINE IL2 ,CPO CPO ,CPO_DTL CD WHERE IV2.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND IV2.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND IV2.INV_NUM = #invNum# AND IL2.INV_NUM = IV2.INV_NUM AND IL2.INV_BOL_LINE_NUM = #invBoLineNum# AND IL2.INV_LINE_NUM = #invLineNum# AND IL2.INV_LINE_SUB_NUM = #invLineSubNum# AND IL2.INV_LINE_SUB_TRX_NUM = #invLineSubTrxNum# AND IL2.GLBL_CMPY_CD = IV2.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND IL2.EZCANCELFLAG = IV2.EZCANCELFLAG AND CPO.CPO_ORD_NUM = IV2.CPO_ORD_NUM AND CPO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = IV2.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND CPO.EZCANCELFLAG = IV2.EZCANCELFLAG AND CD.CPO_ORD_NUM = IV2.CPO_ORD_NUM AND CD.CPO_DTL_LINE_NUM = IL2.CPO_DTL_LINE_NUM AND CD.CPO_DTL_LINE_SUB_NUM = IL2.CPO_DTL_LINE_SUB_NUM AND CD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = IL2.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND CD.EZCANCELFLAG = IL2.EZCANCELFLAG ) ORG WHERE IV.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND IV.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND IV.CPO_ORD_NUM = ORG.ORD_SRC_REF_NUM AND IL.INV_NUM = IV.INV_NUM AND IL.GLBL_CMPY_CD = IV.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND IL.EZCANCELFLAG = IV.EZCANCELFLAG AND IL.CPO_DTL_LINE_NUM = ORG.ORD_SRC_REF_LINE_NUM AND IL.CPO_DTL_LINE_SUB_NUM = ORG.ORD_SRC_REF_LINE_SUB_NUM AND DISC.INV_NUM = IV.INV_NUM AND DISC.INV_BOL_LINE_NUM = IL.INV_BOL_LINE_NUM AND DISC.INV_LINE_NUM = IL.INV_LINE_NUM AND DISC.INV_LINE_SUB_NUM = IL.INV_LINE_SUB_NUM AND DISC.INV_TRX_LINE_SUB_NUM = IL.INV_LINE_SUB_TRX_NUM AND DISC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = IL.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND DISC.EZCANCELFLAG = IL.EZCANCELFLAG AND DISC.SLS_REP_TOC_CD = #slsRepTocCd# AND DISC.SLS_REP_CR_PCT = #slsRepCrPct# AND NVL(DISC.INV_LINE_SPL_TP_CD, 'NONE') = #invLineSplTpCd# AND DISC.INV_LINE_SPL_PCT = #invLineSplPct# AND DAR.DFRD_ACCTG_RULE_CD = DISC.DFRD_ACCTG_RULE_CD AND DAR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = IL.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND DAR.EZCANCELFLAG = IL.EZCANCELFLAG
UNION SELECT DISC.DS_INV_SLS_CR_PK AS DS_INV_SLS_CR_PK ,DISC.DFRD_ACCTG_RULE_CD AS DFRD_ACCTG_RULE_CD ,DAR.DFRD_REV_FLG AS DFRD_REV_FLG FROM DS_INV_SLS_CR DISC ,DFRD_ACCTG_RULE DAR ,INV_LINE IL ,SVC_INV_LINE SIL WHERE DISC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND DISC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND DISC.INV_NUM = #origInvNum# AND DISC.MDSE_CD = #mdseCd# AND DISC.SLS_REP_TOC_CD = #slsRepTocCd# AND NVL(DISC.INV_LINE_SPL_TP_CD, 'NONE') = #invLineSplTpCd#
AND DISC.COA_BR_CD = #coaBrCd#
AND DAR.DFRD_ACCTG_RULE_CD = DISC.DFRD_ACCTG_RULE_CD AND DAR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = DISC.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND DAR.EZCANCELFLAG = DISC.EZCANCELFLAG AND IL.INV_NUM = DISC.INV_NUM AND IL.INV_BOL_LINE_NUM = DISC.INV_BOL_LINE_NUM AND IL.INV_LINE_NUM = DISC.INV_LINE_NUM AND IL.INV_LINE_SUB_NUM = DISC.INV_LINE_SUB_NUM AND IL.INV_LINE_SUB_TRX_NUM = DISC.INV_TRX_LINE_SUB_NUM AND NVL(IL.SVC_INV_CHRG_TP_CD, 'NONE') = #svcInvChrgTpCd# AND IL.GLBL_CMPY_CD = DISC.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND IL.EZCANCELFLAG = DISC.EZCANCELFLAG AND SIL.SVC_INV_LINE_PK = IL.SVC_INV_LINE_PK AND NVL(SIL.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK, 0) = #svcMachMstrPk# AND NVL(SIL.INTG_MDSE_CD, 'NONE') = #intgMdseCd# AND SIL.GLBL_CMPY_CD = DISC.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND SIL.EZCANCELFLAG = DISC.EZCANCELFLAG
UNION SELECT DISC.DS_INV_SLS_CR_PK AS DS_INV_SLS_CR_PK ,DISC.DFRD_ACCTG_RULE_CD AS DFRD_ACCTG_RULE_CD ,DAR.DFRD_REV_FLG AS DFRD_REV_FLG FROM DS_INV_SLS_CR DISC ,DFRD_ACCTG_RULE DAR ,INV_LINE IL ,INV IV WHERE DISC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND DISC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND DISC.INV_NUM = #origInvNum# AND DISC.MDSE_CD = #mdseCd# AND DISC.SLS_REP_TOC_CD = #slsRepTocCd# AND DISC.INV_BOL_LINE_NUM = #invBoLineNum# AND DISC.INV_LINE_NUM = #invLineNum# AND DISC.INV_LINE_SUB_NUM = #invLineSubNum# AND DISC.INV_TRX_LINE_SUB_NUM = #invLineSubTrxNum# AND NVL(DISC.INV_LINE_SPL_TP_CD, 'NONE') = #invLineSplTpCd# AND DAR.DFRD_ACCTG_RULE_CD = DISC.DFRD_ACCTG_RULE_CD AND DAR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = DISC.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND DAR.EZCANCELFLAG = DISC.EZCANCELFLAG AND IL.INV_NUM = DISC.INV_NUM AND IL.INV_BOL_LINE_NUM = DISC.INV_BOL_LINE_NUM AND IL.INV_LINE_NUM = DISC.INV_LINE_NUM AND IL.INV_LINE_SUB_NUM = DISC.INV_LINE_SUB_NUM AND IL.INV_LINE_SUB_TRX_NUM = DISC.INV_TRX_LINE_SUB_NUM AND NVL(IL.SVC_INV_CHRG_TP_CD, 'NONE') = #svcInvChrgTpCd# AND IL.GLBL_CMPY_CD = DISC.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND IL.EZCANCELFLAG = DISC.EZCANCELFLAG AND IV.GLBL_CMPY_CD = IL.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND IV.INV_NUM = IL.INV_NUM AND IV.EZCANCELFLAG = IL.EZCANCELFLAG

SELECT AIAD.GLBL_CMPY_CD ,AIAD.AJE_INV_ACCT_DIST_PK ,AIAD.INV_NUM ,AIAD.INV_BOL_LINE_NUM ,AIAD.INV_LINE_NUM ,AIAD.INV_LINE_SUB_NUM ,AIAD.INV_LINE_SUB_TRX_NUM ,AIAD.AJE_INV_ACCT_DIST_SQ_NUM ,AIAD.PROC_DT ,AIAD.AJE_INV_ACCT_CLS_CD ,AIAD.DR_CR_TP_CD ,AIAD.AJE_COA_CMPY_CD ,AIAD.AJE_COA_BR_CD ,AIAD.AJE_COA_CC_CD ,AIAD.AJE_COA_ACCT_CD ,AIAD.AJE_COA_PROD_CD ,AIAD.AJE_COA_CH_CD ,AIAD.AJE_COA_AFFL_CD ,AIAD.AJE_COA_PROJ_CD ,AIAD.AJE_COA_EXTN_CD ,AIAD.JRNL_DEAL_AMT ,AIAD.JRNL_FUNC_AMT ,AIAD.DEAL_CCY_CD ,AIAD.FUNC_CCY_CD ,AIAD.AJE_INV_ACCT_DIST_PCT ,AIAD.GL_DT ,AIAD.JRNL_CRAT_DT ,AIAD.DS_INV_SLS_CR_PK ,AIAD.AJE_OM_INTFC_PK ,AIAD.PROC_STS_CD ,AIAD.DFRD_REV_GL_STRG_FLG ,AIAD.SYS_SRC_CD ,AIAD.SYS_SRC_NM ,AIAD.TRX_CD ,AIAD.TRX_NM ,AIAD.TRX_RSN_CD ,AIAD.TRX_RSN_NM ,AIAD.AJE_PTRN_IND_TP_CD_01 ,AIAD.AJE_PTRN_IND_TP_NM_01 ,AIAD.AJE_PTRN_ACTL_CD_01 ,AIAD.AJE_PTRN_ACTL_NM_01 ,AIAD.AJE_PTRN_IND_TP_CD_02 ,AIAD.AJE_PTRN_IND_TP_NM_02 ,AIAD.AJE_PTRN_ACTL_CD_02 ,AIAD.AJE_PTRN_ACTL_NM_02 ,AIAD.AJE_PTRN_IND_TP_CD_03 ,AIAD.AJE_PTRN_IND_TP_NM_03 ,AIAD.AJE_PTRN_ACTL_CD_03 ,AIAD.AJE_PTRN_ACTL_NM_03 ,AIAD.JRNL_SRC_CD ,AIAD.JRNL_SRC_NM ,AIAD.JRNL_CATG_CD ,AIAD.JRNL_CATG_NM ,AIAD.AJE_LINE_IDX_NUM ,AIAD.AJE_LINE_IDX_DESC_TXT ,AIAD.AJE_INTFC_CMNT_TXT FROM AJE_INV_ACCT_DIST AIAD ,(SELECT AIAD_G.DS_INV_SLS_CR_PK AS DS_INV_SLS_CR_PK ,MAX(AIAD_G.GL_DT) AS GL_DT FROM AJE_INV_ACCT_DIST AIAD_G WHERE AIAD_G.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND AIAD_G.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND AIAD_G.AJE_INV_ACCT_CLS_CD = #ajeInvAcctClsCd# AND AIAD_G.DS_INV_SLS_CR_PK = #dsInvSlsCrPk# GROUP BY AIAD_G.DS_INV_SLS_CR_PK ) AIAD_MAX WHERE AIAD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND AIAD.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND AIAD.AJE_INV_ACCT_CLS_CD = #ajeInvAcctClsCd# AND AIAD.DS_INV_SLS_CR_PK = AIAD_MAX.DS_INV_SLS_CR_PK AND AIAD.GL_DT = AIAD_MAX.GL_DT
